text:
I'm trying to clone a theme but getting this error:
*Error*
Theme validation failed. Check for syntax errors.

Anyone know how to resolve?
Maybe you link somewhere files from outside of the theme. All files need to be inside the theme folder
Ok, I'll take a look. Thanks
Hi if you're importing data to a hubdb via CSV or via the API, how should images be handled? Should images already be uploaded and you include the image path in the relevant cells?

Reminder: Hey all, if you haven’t taken the time to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|review our slack code of conduct> please do so. It helps keep our community strong and full of HEART :HubSpotheart:. Thank you for being awesome and sharing what you know with fellow devs!

Hi everyone,

I'd like to have access to the new Beta regarding the blog listing and the possibility to use drag & drop modules inside.

Can anyone help me? :slightly_smiling_face:
What’s the best place to learn about ongoing betas (platform-wide)?
<@U01UAPFG9K4> Here I'm on slack. Thank you so much in advance.
